attributes.action: Declare TV license fee a subscription for BBC
attributes.additional_details: This should be done in the interest of fairness as the TV licensing fee is a mandatory subscription for BBC programming where all the recent goes to the BBC but people are required to pay the fee to watch any Tv at time of broadcast.
attributes.background: Declare that the TV licensing fee Is a subscription for BBC TV,  radio and online and therefore should be optional to pay in order to watch BBC productions the same as Sky,  Netflix or Amazon TV
